system.Text:
When __your momentum is at its minimum__ (-6), and you suffer additional -momentum, choose one.

  * Exchange each additional -momentum for any combination of -health, -spirit, or -supply as appropriate to the circumstances.
  * Envision an event or discovery (@Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.aba3e44b7e810c0f]{Ask the Oracle} if unsure) which undermines your progress in a current quest, journey or fight. Then, for each additional _momentum, clear 1 unit of progress on that track per its rank (troublesome=clear 3 progress; dangerous=clear 2 progress; formidable=clear 1 progress; extreme=clear 2 ticks; epic=clear 1 tick).

Trigger.Text: When your momentum is at its minimum (-6), and you suffer additional -momentum...
